Reviews.Title: “Glad I stayed here”
Reviews.Author: ronilynn777
Reviews.Content: This property was very clean and convenient to Love Field. I stayed one night and wish I could have stayed longer. The outside was very attractive and somewhat resort looking. My room had a good working area and was very comfortable. I wish I had brought a swimsuit because the outdoor pool area was inviting. A definite yes on my next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, new LQ”
Reviews.Author: sscorona
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, very clean. Furnishings were all very nice. It was a little hard to find the exit with Google maps, but after turning around once we found it. Centrally located. We have already booked this hotel to stay at again in a few months.

Reviews.Title: “FUTURISTIC BED AND BREAKFAST”
Reviews.Author: Anthony K
Reviews.Content: This is the nicest La Quinta I have stayed at. The room was very upscale with new wood flooring and granite counters in the bathroom. The furnishings were contemporary and the room was very fresh, with wi-fi and a flat panel TV. Friendly staff, excellent exercise facilities, business facilities, laundry room and hot breakfast in the morning made me feel like I was staying at some kind of futuristic bed and breakfast. It was also located near Love Field making my travel in and out of the Dallas area very convenient. I highly recommend this property. Anthony K.

Reviews.Title: “High hopes. . .dashed”
Reviews.Author: Klouisek
Reviews.Content: Had read previous reviews of this facility and knew it was new and accepted dogs. I travel with therapy dogs and prefer LQ's, generally. This facility is beautiful, lovely grounds, easy to find and very spiffy. Customer service is missing in action. I had reserved a king single was given a single queen with a single side chair (think kitchen chair, here) as the only place to sit in the room other than the bed. The room reeked of carpet adhesive. I stood at the check-in counter for twenty minutes while the clerk was busy on the phone. After much prompting, he finally placed a call to 'someone.' In front of me he said, 'there is some woman complaining.' The lack of caring at this LQ was absolute. They absolutely do NOT care. Three weeks later, after complaining to corporate level customer 'service' I received a call from a manager. They 'gave' me a credit of 1000 points. Still waiting for that to show up. . Of interest, some of the dogs who stayed here during the Dallas Dog Show became ill, rashes, sneezing, lots of itching. One wonders about the carpet and cleaning solutions or adhesive? It smells strongly of 'new' carpeting..

Reviews.Title: “BEST La Quinta We've Stayed In”
Reviews.Author: Moonette
Reviews.Content: If you read my reviews, you'll notice we've stayed at a LOT of LQs. When we drive somewhere, we have our dog with us, and LQs take pets. That said, this was the absolute BEST La Quinta we've ever stayed in. Yes, it's brand new, but we've stayed in other new hotels that were not as nice. This LQ was clean, bright, and comfortable. . . The bed was the most comfortable hotel bed we've stayed in in a long time. I liked that there was wood laminate flooring inside the door of the room. (I wish American hotels would use laminate throughout the room . . . much more sanitary.) The bathroom was more upscale than other LQs. The furniture and carpet were quite contemporary. The only glitch was that the breakfast attendant forgot to turn on the waffle iron, so we had no waffles that morning. :-( No big deal. There are other choices. All-in-all, a great experience. If I had to go to Dallas on business, I'd choose this hotel even if I didn't have a dog with me.

Reviews.Title: “Best La Qunita I've ever seen”
Reviews.Author: Tony D
Reviews.Content: Ive been to several la Qunita's across the nation and i've never seen one this clean. Felt liek i was staying at fancy hotel. The lobby and facilities are very nice. I would definitely return!

Reviews.Title: “Best value with beautiful clean rooms and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Joye F
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel DEC 2011 and had a very nice experience. The hotel is brand new, very clean, everything works and the staff is very friendly. The king suite was very big with microwave, fridge and a big flat screen TV! The great price included a breakfast with so much to choose from, a fitness center and even wash machines for guests to use. The pool looks very nice but it was a little to cold to try it this time. We will be back! Oh, they even have a program to sign up for to get free nights for staying at LaQuintas. This hotel chain sure has changed over the past years!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Experience”
Reviews.Author: Shiny J
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this property and had a wonderful experience. The staff is very helpful and courteous. They went out of their way to help us with few things that we needed. They also have a nice sundary place filled with chips and candies and also fresh cold sandwich . The entire hotel was so clean and smelled so good. It was so comfortable to stay here. We had a wonderful experience and we are definitlly going back there again.

HotelInfo.Name: La Quinta Inn & Suites Dallas Love Field
HotelInfo.Address: 8300 John W. Carpenter Fwy., Dallas, TX 75247
